Reviews.Title: Very sturdy and fast
Reviews.Author: Drew G
Reviews.Content: You are probably not buying a Toughbook for aesthetics, so I will skip that. Or weight and size, so I'll skip those too.This product works.We use one at our retail store and its has been dropped, stepped on, and spilled on, and its still going strong. The lack of pre-installed bloatware is refreshing, and it has performed reliably under heavy use. Definitely reccomend to anyone who puts a lot of wear and tear on their computer.

Reviews.Title: Very nice laptop, NO BLOATWARE!
Reviews.Author: T. Van Driska
Reviews.Content: Laptop was graduation gift for 18 y/o son.  Delivery was perfect, computer is very nice with no bloatware like many other computers from the factory come with.  No garbage, just a fast, sturdy machine ready to be dragged off to college.
